DTU Eligibility Criteria:
Inclusion Criteria (ALL must apply):
- Stable vital signs
- Results of initial investigations available
- History consistent with ureteral colic (flank pain radiating to groin, hematuria)
- Imaging study confirms ureteral calculi
- Uncontrolled pain and/or awaiting lithotripsy
- Able to mobilize with assistance

Exclusion Criteria (ANY may apply):
- New onset severe renal impairment
- Signs of urosepsis
- High grade obstruction
- Staghorn calculus
- Significant co-morbid conditions
Discharge patient as per as per provider specific instructions: ______
